column3:
“The weather is beautiful today and I have a lot I needed to get done but I also wanted to get high so I asked my bud-tender what she'd recommend. While we were looking at some sativa flowers the word Gelato caught the corner of my eye on the hybrid shelf. I'm a huge fan of Gelato, it's one of the most potent strains I've tried, so I got an eighth of Guava Gelato and headed straight home. 

I figured that I probably w...”
“tasty strain here... as soon you break it down the smell of tropical hit you with a dash of cream and nuts. Got it from the Cannary on Venice a while back”

“Absolutely love this one might be my new favorite one hats off to the guys at cookies connected used to be cookies or serve I'm looking for on Leafly and I can't find it so just letting you guys know this is a heavy hitter cases that you like guava it's I believe gelato 33 crossword just the regular guava if you watch burgers bigger business you'll see with the guava is and see even who grew it in People from the Bay...”

“1 of my top 5 2017 strain of gelato pheno very jelly ice cream terpy frosty buds with tints of green and purple frosty nugs made for og smokers not for rookies heavy indica high and terpy exotic taste from the 718”

“The smell of this almost knocked me over from 10 feet away when the canister was opened, it’s that amazing. I actually got this over the summer and was just floored by it, and have been looking for it ever since. You see it, definitely give it a try. Relaxing without making you couch locked, yet keeps you alert and on task. Great great GREAT strain”
“Does wonders for my pain issues and has one of the most enjoyable aroma/tastes. RECOMMEND TO ALL (where available)”

“I suffer from anxiety and tend to stray away from anything with low CBD content.  But this was a complete euphoric & happy high which made most of my day more tolerable.  0 paranoia which also worries me about certain hybrids.

Highly recommend for those looking to feel light on the feet, get creative and still get some shit done!”

“Fell in love with Gelato, so I couldn’t wait to get home n roll this guava gelato. As soon as I opened the bag it smelled like a tropical swisher sweet or something..all I could thing was “Maui Maui!” Extremely potent with a distinctive smell. First 3 hits run thru the entire body and you fall into an instant state of relaxation. You almost feel like you took a shot or 2 if your favorite liquor. This weed is da shit!...”

“I vape...
 Guava is very tropical , with a taste of rosemary.
Quite refreshing flavor.
Smooth relaxation time.”
“Unique flavour. I adore this strain. Highly recommended.”
“Tropical fruity slightly minty taste . Amazing smell hits are sweet and smoothe. Mellow high not overwhelming.”

“it's very different .Extremely Frosty.
overall rating  7.8 out of 10 in my opinion💙”
“Super smooth. This strain taste like rich creamy ice cream. Relaxing was easy with this. This version of Gelato is good but I still stand behind the original.”
